ep:phrases.ep:phrase:
Please give details of membership of:
major funding bodies
research-based bodies
august bodies
national and international strategic advisory bodies
peer review bodies
learned institutes or societies
editorial boards
university and industry advisory panels

Please give details of:
editorships of major research journals (national and international)
editorships of peer-reviewed monograph series
editorial activities
refereeing or reviewing for publishers or journals

Please give details of:
speaking at a major research meeting
named lectures
keynote, invited and plenary addresses and papers at major conferences
conference organisation or hosting
conference chairing

Please give details of:
fellowships
major research prizes and awards (national and international)
visiting professorships, lectureships and researchers
election to learned society

Please give details of:
external funding
research income

Please give details of:
impacts on the research community
research practice and policy
government policy
national and international practice

Please give details of contributions to:
public, voluntary, government and industrial advisory bodies
major committees and working groups
national and international agencies
arts, media and creative industries

Please give details of:
high volume of citations
commercialisation of research output
review articles
inclusion in anthologies
translation into foreign languages
prominent public dissemination

Please give any other details here. For example:
number of PhD external examiner appointments
refereeing research grant applications
external assessor for chair appointments
external departmental reviews
participation in overseas research assessment activities
